content: terraform is a textured shawl that can be made to any size it is asymmetrical and can be worn in a multitude of ways it can be wrapped twisted and draped to compliment just about any outfit wear it like a cowl drape it like a bandana or just throw it over one shoulder to give a pop of color instructions are included for several options want to use beads it can be done don t want to have to work any yarn overs gotcha covered wanna stripe it not a problem i have included both written and charted instructions want some company while you knit stop by my group dartfrog designs 1 this will become a go to pattern for gift giving it is great for using up those beautiful skeins of yarn that we are all guilty of picking up i forgot to mention that the 0 on the chart stands for yarn over on the dropped stitch version chart 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/dartfrog-designs
